mapper.select: select c.category_id as categoryId, c.category_name as categoryName, c.parent_id as parentId, c.priority as priority, c.remark, p.category_name as parentName, (select count(*) from cms_category as temp where temp.parent_id = c.category_id) as childCount from cms_category as c left join cms_category as p on p.category_id = c.parent_id where c.parent_id = #{parentId}
